start.text: Captain, I'll show you a new magic trick after this battle

retreat.text: Kurumi's performance, drawing to a wonderful close!

out_of_missiles.text: The missile for the performance has ran out
We got no more missile prop in stock?!

engaged.text: Though it hasn't been too long, but the captain already got used to my presence, that's a good thing, right?
If you want to see a magic show, you gotta praise me a bit at least?
Watch the Captain? Taking good care of the captain is my duty.....just part of the job~
It's not fun if you give away the mystery at the start.

need_help.text: Uhh, come give Kurumi a hand, Catapin
Captain! Come over here and watch my magic show!

pursuing.text: Eh, so their ship blows up if I press this button?

running.text: Getting a bit tired with this performance, time for a break

hull_90.text: The prop is a bit damaged
Guess I will have to maintain the props properly after this

hull_50.text: You want to find my hidden props like this? No way~

hull_30.text: What! Kurumi is in a big pinch!
Look's like the show is over
The captain havent finished watching Kurumi's performance, this isn't over!

overload.text: What! An accident in the show!
Overloading is as annoying as interrupted shows

death.text: Can't perform for the captain anymore......
Doing magic trick with cards is not the same as playing with them, losing is understandable

victory.text: Captain, do you want to see the special performance I prepared for you?
Captain! I hid a present, you can find it anywhere within your ship!
So about love on first sight......aiya, could it be that the Captain doesn't believe in it?
What will it be like if I had met the Captain much, much earlier?
